post.body: i keep wanting to make gmail my absolute default but continue to hear people find my mail in their spam folders - hear of a fix?
COOL!thanks for pointing out the extra gmail features - will it do my laundry too?
put the fuzzy red guy down!
thanks for reminding me to take a break. i think today needs a nap in the middle of it - will the kids cooperate? here i go!
no i didnt, but YAY! did california schools start that a few years ago?
great idea, WP 2.7 is fabulous!
we dont get all the attention, we r our own cheerleading squad... you can have a pom pom too :D we're all 24/7, see the bags?
dig deeper i say- dont just blog a hoodie- blog ur moms apple pie 4 neighbor favorite story & why your hoodie came to the rescue ;)
you and @samharrelson need to swap for an hour
thats why toddlers nap twice a day - we should all learn something from that
ya wanna borrow mine? it only gets to eat credit cards and misc small plastic toys
wait, what.. whats the blog inspiration? did @blip bribe you or say i would? what?
CONGRATS on making the Best Video Podcasts list on itunes - your pod icon was all fancy in our email yesterday ;) Happy Friday!
shouldn't you be sitting in the far back corner anyway? thats where all the good coffee smell is
oh no! did you put a bow on it at least?
love love love working at paris on the platte.. i miss those days - the atmosphere alone is inspiring
ive never heard of wetpaint.. other than the thing that my kids leave on the walls when we're attempting a creative day
I agree! mostly never :P but in this case, for you, yes
I didnt hear that dinner bell! nice to see you twitter from time to time
advanced tip booklet for cooking, appropriate apron wearing or adwording? - such unique gifts google gives!
so far, so good. i'm liking the new dashboard of wp 2.7
any why is it everything goes all out of proportion, but its ok because we have kids? are they rationalizing for us?
I agree! and perception of success (or not) is far too influential without any support or backing over the actuality of either
no coffee.. a little nap does wonders sometimes.. plus the shear excitement of driving through Kansas in the middle of the night
thank you! Love your new profile pic - happy holidays to u and @k80bug
oh yay! Disneyland for Christmas, you're a lucky duck! Have a blast
remind me when I'm by a computer- sniffer fix could just be a simple redefine of image variable in shop header-would be nice
sweet dreaming filled with visions if sugar plums you didn't need to draw yourself :)
absolutely! The American grill at the rio has fabulous shakes! FYI Colorado peeps Saturday night gathering at aff sum, u in?
LOL never thought of the cold aspect... chocolate milkshakes are happiness with a straw - congrats for hug tour interview!
linerider.com very cool!
FEEDBACK please: Who do u use for hosting? Do u have a dedicated server account or does ur host accomodate high traffic without it? thanks!
Retweeting @garyvee: http://tinyurl.com/loveuguys only valid for 12 hrs. Free shipping for Twitters Enjoy it!
when u see a listed price on a website - sale has ended yet the price is still reduced, isdon't they have to honor the sale price?
just deleted 4536 emails... and thats just from two folders - i think people need to stop sending me things i'm not going to read
listening to a $5 christmas CD i bought from kolhs yesterday - all money goes to kids' charities - its a really great compilation
WHOA! just upgraded wordpress to 2.7 - the dashboard is changed again- but i like it + thanks @KunalGautam for the encouragement - painless
The inside scoop on Change http://tinyurl.com/5zngan
twitter wont let me update my profile pic -- how am i supposed to be festive is the whale keeps showing up?
I think its too cold to be productive.. unless i was sipping chocolate by a fireplace and fuzzy socks on - no cocoa & fuzzy socks in wash
listening to Vertical Horizon - used to LOVEthis album and just rediscovered it in a box over the weekend - the kids like it too
making memorybook pages with the family for my grandparents' christmas gift.. it's fun to look at the year's past photos of the kids
just got back from donating 10 lawn bags full of clothes - and buying one kiddo drum stuff + lessons - I love productivity like this!
whats up with this Kiva team competition? And who names themself after a sappy sweet n sticky treat... butterscotch what?? :P
Happy weekending everyone!
Stargate is on - new episode - I must detach from the keyboard for an hour -- eeek and she just stabbed the guy!
Retweeting @jowyang: Bone Marrow Drive in Silicon Valley, are you in the area on Sunday? http://snipurl.com/7wnrt Esp need Asian donors.
Happy Christmas eve!
Signing out for some much needed family time... Happy bonding, my Twitter pals and thank you for all the smiles!
Working while listening to the rain outside. this is so weird to hear rain in the middle of December, I kind of like it.
eating a fresh just out of the oven chocolate chip cookie... oh how I love hanging at Nana's house!
Happy almost Christmas Eve! hope your day is warm and cozy...
Hello St Louis! The penguinmobile has arrived before the weather ... It's barely spitting, thank goodness
Wow there are a ton of people on the road at 5am - working from home my perspective is so clueless... And grateful
ohhh my turn to drive - Missouri darkness here I come! Coke Slurpee and all :)
Loving the iPhone facebook app... Never had the chance to really look at it until now
The night was black as pitch with an ocassional twinkle of light as if to wave hello along the quiet road ... And then there was walmart
Causing havoc at the mcdonalds drive thru... Looking for all the different mini ponies
Woohoo 30 bucks to fill the 26 gal tank just now - I love Missouri!
When roadtripping I luv watching the approach of cities when all we can see is the reflection of city lights in the clouds- hello kasas city
